Template used: "Customer support"; last updated: 2025-01-28 16:04:24.483

Capillus: I'm still waiting to hear back from the team, but it may help to email us directly at support@capillus.com. Our team is happy to help! If you don't see any responses in your inbox, be sure to check your spam and promo folders; sometimes our emails end up there as well. Let me know how it goes.

send_to_cs: Send to CS if a subscriber mentions a medical issue or an adverse effect from using products from this brand
dos_and_don_ts: Do not share any medical advice or guidance to subscribers outside of recommending appropriate products or directing them to purchase the right item
Do not comment on their medical situations
Close the covo if the customer says they're receiving too many messages/we're texting them too often - don't send TMT
drive_to_purchase: If cx says they will be ordering soon, offer to schedule a call if they need further assistance with their purchase (shortcut OS) - do not upsell
tone: Don't use the term "hang tight", just say that you've passed the information to the team
Close the conversation once the client takes over
templates: If cx already purchased, use specific TFP template
promo_and_promo_exclusions: We do not offer any discounts for the SPECTRUM

conversation.message_text: Simply Earth: Reply Y to subscribe to recurring automated personalized marketing alerts (e.g. cart reminders) from Simply Earth.
Simply Earth: Welcome to Simply Earth! Msg & data rates may apply. Msg frequency varies. Reply HELP for help, STOP to cancel.

Simply Earth: Hi Earthie! This is Sarah. Thanks for signing up via text! Use code UNICORN to get a free unicorn diffuser with your 1st Recipe Box! https://simplyearth.attn.tv/aMsus_CJWiuj 

Have any questions? Reply here!
Simply Earth: We pride ourselves on our customer service. Save our contact in your phone and text us whenever you have a question about the Recipe Box!

Simply Earth: What are you looking for in your essential oil journey? Reply with the number that best matches your desire!

1 for Community
2 for Confidence + Clarity
3 for Saving Money

Simply Earth: With the Recipe Box, you're receiving 4 full-size, 100% pure essential oils + 6 recipes + more for just $35! That's the price of a single essential oil at some other places... simplyearth.attn.tv/asjvsYEwNVB1
I make candles can these oils be used in candle making, bath bumps, lip balm, and lotions?
Simply Earth: Yes, our essential oils can be used in candle making, bath bombs, lip balm, and lotions. They are 100% pure and perfect for DIY projects.
Also looking to add room sprays to my line. How do I market using these oils from simply earth?

Simply Earth: For room sprays, consider using our Car Diffuser Vent Clip for inspiration. It's a great way to showcase the versatility of Simply Earth's essential oils. https://simplyearth.attn.tv/aiM39-mxUxNi
Thank you
One more question can I sell these oils on my website?
Template used: "Wholesale inquiries"; last updated: 2023-02-13 23:02:56.564
Simply Earth: Thank you for being so interested! You can learn more and apply for wholesale here: https://simplyearth.attn.tv/a0Wu-q1awByw Hope this helps!

conversation.message_text: CALPAK: Welcome! Msg & data rates may apply. Msg frequency varies. Reply HELP for help, STOP to cancel.

CALPAK: Thanks for traveling with CALPAK. Enjoy 10% off your first order with code AT1NT1V26IRvPlO.

Shop best sellers: calpak.attn.tv/aiZpWomHA4g5 
*Offer expires in 7 days and excludes sale items.
CALPAK: Save our number so you never miss an update!
My discount code is not working

CALPAK: Thank you for reaching out, and I'm sorry to hear that! Our promo codes are only eligible for full-priced items. They don't work on already discounted products, including bundled sets. I'm sorry for the inconvenience.
I am trying to buy something that is full price.
CALPAK: I completely understand and I apologize for the inconvenience. Mind sending a screenshot of the items in your cart and the error message so I can check?
Template used: "Invalid code for marketing texts - All brands"; last updated: 2023-10-10 16:39:50.091

CALPAK: Thank you for sharing that. Upon checking, the code AT1NT1V26IRvPlO appears to work on my end. Just to make sure, have you signed up for text or email alerts before? If so, our system is set up to give the same promo you previously received, which might be why that code isn't working!

Any questions I can answer for you?
.
What special finance do you have going on ?
DreamCloud: We offer financing via Affirm. Learn more here: https://dreamcloud.attn.tv/aPJR312sArC7/
DreamCloud: You are already subscribed. Click here to shop now: https://dreamcloud.attn.tv/cl/0Ee
I'm not seeing financing for 24 months it only offered 6 months

DreamCloud: Thank you for sharing this with me, and I'm sorry about that. Can you please share what you see on your end? Also, if you've already applied for a loan with Affirm, they will notify you of the loan amount you're approved for, the interest rate, and the number of months you will have to pay off your loan. You will have the option to choose to pay off your loan over time. Affirm will also state the amount of your fixed, monthly payments and the total amount of interest you'll pay over the course of the loan. You can read more about it here: https://dreamcloud.attn.tv/aLf1Htf0WDV2
Thank you but I changed my mind for now
